title: Lincoln Boyhood National Memorial: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         Park Volunteer made butter at the Living Historical Farm NPS: Corkey M. Davis    Volunteer Lincoln Boyhood is served by several volunteers each year. Volunteers help Lincoln Boyhood in a variety of ways from enhancing visitor services to sharing specialized expertise to help protect and preserve park history and resources. Work With Us Approximately 20 people work for the NPS at Lincoln Boyhood. Employees provide service to nearly 100,000 visitors annually in a wide variety of different types of jobs throughout the park.
